FrageText.de: Was überprüfen Sie an der Antriebskette eines Motorrades?
FrageText.en: What do you check on the driving chain of your motorcycle?
FrageText.hr: Što provjeravate na pogonskom lancu motocikla?
FrageText.sl: Kaj preizkusite na pogonski verigi motornega kolesa?
FrageText.tr: Motorsikletinizin tahrik zincirinde neyi kontrol edersiniz?

en.Text: The lubrication and the chain alignment
